```{r cars}
# install.packages(c("lidR","rlas))

library(lidR)
library(rlas)
library(raster)
library(sf)
# library(rLiDAR)

```

## Get Data from OpenTopo

```{r}
# Get data from OpenTopography (http://opentopo.sdsc.edu)
# download.file("https://cloud.sdsc.edu/v1/AUTH_opentopography/PC_Bulk/USBR_UCRB_East/Okanogan/CAN/49119-A4-nw-BB.laz"

  las <- readLAS("data/20191106_Day_2_PM_Raster/raster_lidar/49119-A4-nw-BB.laz")
  
  las
  las@data
  las@header
  las@bbox
  las@proj4string
  lascheck(las)

  plot(las)

```

## Where is this lidar
  
```{r}
  
  e <- extent(las@bbox)

  esf <- e %>% as('SpatialPolygons') %>% 
    st_as_sf() %>% 
    st_set_crs(crs(las))

  mapview::mapview(esf)
  
```

## Rasterize the data

```{r}

# Create empty raster
  xmin = e[1]
  xmax = e[2]
  ymin = e[3]
  ymax = e[4]

  cellsize <- 2
  
  r <- raster(e, ncol=(xmax-xmin)/cellsize, nrow=(ymax - ymin)/cellsize, crs = crs(las))

# .Las to .Tif
  r_min <- rasterize(las@data[, 1:2], r, las@data[,3], fun=min)
  r_max <- rasterize(las@data[, 1:2], r, las@data[,3], fun=max)
  r_dif <- r_max-r_min

# Reclassify Canopy height model (r_max - r_min) to drop <5m as NA
  r_dif_cl <-reclassify(r_dif, rcl = c(-Inf,5,NA))

# View and Export
  mapview::mapview(r_dif_cl,map.types="Esri.WorldImagery", na.color = NA)
```
